reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 218/17: SPECIFIED QUALIFYING TRUSTS - DATE FOR COMING INTO EXISTENCE UNDER CLAUSE 1 (1.0.1) (B) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: SPECIFIED QUALIFYING TRUSTS - DATE FOR COMING INTO EXISTENCE UNDER CLAUSE 1 (1.0.1) (B) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Retail Sales Tax Act   Loi sur la taxe de vente au détail

content.section: Prescribed period, s. 1 (1.0.1) (b) of the Act
content.content: 1. For the purposes of clause 1 (1.0.1) (b) of the Act, the period of two years is prescribed for the following qualifying trusts: 1. The employee life and health trust known as USW Local 1005 ELHT. 2. The employee life and health trust known as USW Local 8782 ELHT. 3. The employee life and health trust known as Stelco Non-USW Retiree Life and Health Trust.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of clause 1 (1.0.1) (b) of the Act, the period of two years is prescribed for the following qualifying trusts:

1. The employee life and health trust known as USW Local 1005 ELHT.

2. The employee life and health trust known as USW Local 8782 ELHT.

3. The employee life and health trust known as Stelco Non-USW Retiree Life and Health Trust.

content.section: Prescribed period, s. 1 (1.0.1) (b) of the Act
content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
